quote: I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don’t know what exactly I’ll be able to do for you, but I’ll always be by your side.
The only thing we're allowed to do is believe. We can't change anything.

A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart. A fullmetal heart.
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
Even in the darkest times, hope is something that you can hold on to.
I don't wanna conquer anything. It's just that the person with the most freedom on the sea is the Pirate King!
I'm not a hero because I want your approval. I do it because I want to.
In this world, the ones who smile are the strongest.
I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!
I'm not going there to die. I'm going to find out if I'm really alive.
The only ones who should kill are those prepared to be killed.
Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
The things that are most important aren't written in books. You have to learn them by experiencing them yourself.
If you were to write a story with me in the lead role, it would certainly be... a tragedy.
If I were rain, that joins sky and earth that otherwise never touch, could I join two hearts as well?
Human beings are strong because we have the ability to change ourselves.
Humankind cannot gain anything without first giving something in return. To obtain, something of equal value must be lost.
Hard work is worthless for those that don't believe in themselves.
Humans, who are proud of their own free will, are blind to this truth. That they themselves are being manipulated by someone.
The only time you should ever look back, is to see how far you've come.
I'm sure that there are people waiting for you in the future. So please, keep walking. And when you find them, cherish them with all your heart.
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win.
What separates humans from other animals is the ability to be logical and change themselves.
The moment you start getting scared of losing is the moment you'll start playing to lose.
Explosion magic is all about determination! If you have it, you can make anything explode!
Believe in yourself. Not in the you who believes in me. Not the me who believes in you. Believe in the you who believes in yourself.
If you want to be a good person, you have to believe in the goodness of others.
I won't die for anyone else's sake anymore... I'll live my life for myself.
There's no such thing as too cautious. After all, life is full of surprises.
anime: Cautious Hero: The Hero Is Overpowered But Overly Cautious

quote: Time waits for no one. It's not something that you can hold onto. The only thing you can do is make the most of each and every moment.
I want to help people as much as I can. That's why I became a Jujutsu sorcerer.
Society may sometimes disappoint us, but it's important to remember that we are all human and we all have our own struggles.
Human beings are strong because we can change ourselves.
I am your god. The only one who can hear your prayers. If you work and pray to me, I'll help you find your way.
In this world, the ones who smile are the strongest.
The tailed beast is nothing more than a tool, just like any other weapon. It is the way it is used that gives it meaning and purpose.
If you have time to think of a beautiful end, then why not live beautifully until the end?
Books are nice, aren't they? With just one sentence you can get lost in all sorts of dreams.
I want to be like the heroes in the comics, but real heroes are not like that. They are kind, and they are strong, and they help people. That's what I want to be.
It's not about changing the world. It's about doing our best to leave the world... the way it is. It's about respecting the will of others, and believing in your own.
I have to keep fighting. I have to keep struggling. Otherwise, I'll lose myself.
No one knows what the future holds. That's why its potential is infinite.
Life is an endless cycle of pain, but I will not let it break me.
I hate waiting, but if waiting means being able to be with you I'll wait for as long as
I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don’t know what exactly I’ll be able to do for you, but I’ll always be by your side.
The only thing we're allowed to do is believe. We can't change anything.

A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart. A fullmetal heart.
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
Even in the darkest times, hope is something that you can hold on to.
I'm not a hero because I want your approval. I do it because I want to.
I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!
I'm not running away, I'm just advancing towards my goal from a different direction!
If you want to protect someone, you need power. If you don't have power, there's no way you can protect anything!
It's not about dying for your comrades, it's about living for them!
You mustn't be too reckless, but neither should you be too cautious. The greatest risks bring the greatest rewards!
The only ones who can truly understand the Hashira's thoughts and feelings are the Hashira themselves. We cannot fully comprehend each other's feelings!
People, no matter how much you change them, they'll always be the same in the end.
Even if the sun does rise again, I won't be able to see it anymore.
It's just that I'm used to pain, and I'm good at dealing with it. It's not something I'm proud of, but it's the truth.
No matter what happens, never give up on your life.
As long as you're alive, there's always a chance things will get better.
Don't forget, demons were once human too. They were once like us.
I was saved by someone when I was little. I want to be able to do the same for someone else.
It's not just about having strength. It's about having the will to use that strength.
It's not that you can't see the future. It's just that the future is always changing.
I don't know how to express myself very well, but I'm grateful for everything you've done for us.
I don't care about being a hero or a villain. I'm just gonna be the world's greatest swordsman!
I don't need to be saved. I'm the navigator of the Straw Hat Pirates!
I don't care if you're a pirate or a Marine. I'll help anyone who's sick or injured!
I don't want to die, but I'm willing to risk my life to live!
I don't want to be a brave warrior of the sea. I just want to be a brave warrior of the Usopp Pirates!
I don't regret anything. The things I did, the things I chose to do, I did them with no regrets!
Those who cannot acknowledge themselves, will eventually fail.
People, who cannot recognize their own selves, are bound to fail.
It doesn't matter who I am now. What I am going to become, is all that matters.
It's foolish to fear what we've yet to see and know.
In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, that's true, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
The moment people come to know love, they run the risk of carrying hate.

People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define 'Reality'. But what does it mean to be 'correct' or 'true'? Merely vague concepts... their 'Reality' may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world, shaped by their beliefs?
It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.
Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain because life’s greatest lessons are learned through pain.
I have no regrets. Because I’ve made the choices I’ve made, I am who I am today.
The Hashira's duty is to protect humanity, not just defeat demons.
We have no time to hesitate or waver. We must keep moving forward.
A strong sword, a pure heart, and a determined mind. That is all you need.
There are no coincidences in this world. Everything happens for a reason.
If you want to protect someone, you must be strong enough to defeat their enemies.
To protect someone, you must first know what it is to lose that protection.
Don't waste a single life. That is the way of a true swordsman.
To reach the height of strength, one must first face their weakness.
I believe that everyone is born equal. It is only their actions that set them apart.
The true strength of a Demon Slayer comes not from the sword, but from the heart.
The weak die. The strong live. Those are the rules.
The desire for power is what makes humans so interesting.
Death is the natural end for all living beings. Why resist it?
My power is absolute. No one can defeat me.
I will live forever, and I will rule over everything. That is my destiny.
Those who seek power must first be willing to pay its price.
I have lived for centuries, and I have seen the rise and fall of countless empires.
Only the strongest can survive in this world. That is the way of nature.
Strength is not just a matter of physical power. It is also a matter of willpower.
To achieve greatness, one must be willing to sacrifice everything.
